    • Method Detail

      • getPacket

        @Deprecated
public Packet getPacket(byte opCode)
        Deprecated. Search by name to avoid getting the wrong packet or include the client type to filter.
        Get a packet this PacketManager handles.
        Parameters:
        opCode - The OpCode for the packet.
        Returns:
        The packet found, if no packet is found, then it will return null.

      • getPacket

        public Packet getPacket(byte opCode,
               Client client)
        Get a packet this PacketManager handles and only include packets the client "client" supports.
        Parameters:
        opCode - The OpCode for the packet.
        client - The client type. This will exclude all other client types.
        Returns:
        The packet found, if no packet is found, then it will return null.

      • getPacket

        public Packet getPacket(String name)
        Get a packet this PacketManager handles.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the packet
        Returns:
        The packet found, if no packet is found, then it will return null.

        Parameters:
